description:
The weather outside might be frightful, but you can go out anyway. Built for the rugged conditions in the coldest parts of our country, these boots are ready for whatever winter has in store. A rubber outsole blocks out snow and slush, while a tall leather shaft blocks out tall drifts. A thick felt liner insulates feet against serious cold – Baffin recommends these boots for temps as low as -40°C.

  • Waterproof, full-grain leather uppers with gusseted tongue for protection from the elements
  • Flexible Arctic Rubber™ shell provides cold-resistance, and durability
  • Thermaplush™ soft, next-to-foot wicking layer for warmth
  • Form-fitting B-Tek™ Foam lining for comfort
  • DiamondNet™ insulation for wind-resistance with a lightweight feel
  • Hydromax™ layering provides excellent moisture management
  • PolyWool™ polyester wool blend is highly breathable
  • Midsoles are highly flexible GelFlex™ for shock absorption and rebound
  • Polar Rubber™ outsole for maximized grip and durability
name: Baffin Cambrian Waterproof Winter Boots - Men's
